title: Social Connectedness Enhancement Program for Adult Learners in Online Mathematics Learning

context.additional_context: A university-corporate linked program in an asynchronous online environment that strengthens foundational math competencies while fostering peer relationships among learners

learning_goals: Learners share mathematical problem-solving processes by participating in meaningful discussions at least three times weekly on online discussion boards.
Learners execute collaborative learning facilitation techniques via peer assessment during group tasks with over 80% accuracy.
Learners voluntarily engage in informal peer interactions at least twice monthly using asynchronous communication tools.
Learners achieve a score of 4.0/5.0 or higher on a social connectedness survey upon course completion.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
